plot: Jeremy tests the new Porsche Cayman. James and Richard play with life-size radio-controlled cars. Jeremy races an Audi RS4 against a speed climber to the top of Verdon Gorge in France. Ian Wright is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.

Jeremy road tests the new Porsche Cayman. James and Richard play with life-size radio-controlled cars that is based on real life cars. Jeremy tests the new Audi RS4 by racing it to the top Verdon Gorge in France against a speed climber. Ian Wright is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Caboose
